resources.string: We\'ll explain the benefits of having a Terms and Conditions agreement for your mobile app and show you some examples of the most important clauses to include in your agreement.

Your mobile app needs a Terms and Conditions if you want to stop abusive users, terminate access or accounts at your sole discretion, and enforce rules and guidelines that you set. It\'s the set of rules that users must follow to access, use and continue to use your app.

What is a Privacy Policy? A Privacy Policy is a statement or a legal document that states how a company or website collects, handles and processes data of its customers and visitors. It explicitly describes whether that information is kept confidential, or is shared with or sold to third parties.
Copyright is a type of intellectual property that gives its owner the exclusive right to make copies of a creative work, usually for a limited time
When visiting Tulsi Marketing at Kr Mohalla, customers will be awe-struck by the entire range of products that are available here.
